statements: UPDATE digital_asset_ownership SET token_amount = 100.50, owner_id = 12345 WHERE asset_id = 101
UPDATE digital_asset_ownership SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', asset_name = 'Updated Asset' WHERE owner_id = 54321
UPDATE digital_asset_ownership SET token_amount = 150.50, timestamp = '2022-01-10 12:00:00' WHERE asset_id = 123 AND owner_id = 456
UPDATE digital_asset_ownership SET token_type = 'fungible', asset_name = 'Gold Bar', timestamp = NOW() WHERE asset_id = 789 AND owner_id = 987
UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address = '123 Main St' WHERE asset_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE asset_ownership SET ownership_status = 'Inactive', owner_name = 'John Doe' WHERE asset_id = 'xyz456';
UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address='0x9f6b6118c5f28d9986eb28ff59553a569046a203', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE asset_id='4f3d8420-0a4f-45a0-a619-3e983b349ae0';

UPDATE digital_asset_owners SET owner_address = '0xAcF4568Bd47d8BdA8158603D28fFa4aB5e863ecd', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE digital_asset_metadata SET asset_name = 'Example Asset', asset_description = 'This is an example asset.', updated_at = NOW() WHERE asset_id = 'd32e9fb5-8479-4db5-bf86-2d6f69d6764c';

UPDATE digital_asset_metadata SET asset_type='NFT', asset_description='Digital art piece by famous artist', created_at='2022-05-15 12:30:00' WHERE asset_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE asset_owners SET total_assets_owned = 15, owner_name = 'John Doe' WHERE owner_id = 3;
UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address='0x1234567890abcdef', token_type='ERC-721' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE asset_owners SET total_assets_owned=150 WHERE owner_id=5;
